AT.name: Pokémon Rumble World
AT.description: In Pokémon Rumble World, das im Nintendo eShop für die Systeme der Nintendo 3DS-Familie erhältlich ist, erlebst du ein aufregendes Abenteuer mit Pokémon-Spielfiguren. Du kämpfst dich in diesem actionreichen Titel durch vielfältige Spielumgebungen, kannst über 700 Pokémon-Spielfiguren sammeln und das Spielfigurenland als dein Mii erkunden. Der Herrscher über das Spielfigurenland hat dich entsandt, so viele Pokémon-Spielfiguren wie möglich aufzuspüren. In Heißluftballons gelangst du in verschiedene Gegenden, wo die alle möglichen Arten von Pokémon-Spielfiguren finden kannst, von Pokémon aus Pokémon Rote Edition und Pokémon Blaue Edition bis zu welchen aus Pokémon Omega Rubin und Pokémon Alpha Saphir. Einige davon können sogar eine Mega-Entwicklung vollziehen. Wohin dich dein Abenteuer führt, ist abhängig vom Typ des jeweiligen Ballons, und du weißt nie genau, wo du in einem Gebiet landen wirst.

AU.name: Pokémon Rumble World
AU.description: Wind up for an exciting adventure with Toy Pokémon in Pokémon Rumble World, available from Nintendo eShop for Nintendo 3DS family systems. In this action-packed title, battle through a variety of environments to collect more than 700 Toy Pokémon, and explore the kingdom of toys as your Mii! The ruler of the kingdom of toys has sent you on an adventure to track down as many Toy Pokémon as you can. Catch hot-air balloons to different areas to find all kinds of Toy Pokémon, including Pokémon from Pokémon Red and Pokémon Blue right through to Pokémon Omega Ruby and Pokémon Alpha Sapphire – some can even Mega Evolve! Where you go depends on the type of hot-air balloon you use, and you never know exactly where you’ll land in an area!

BR.name: Pokémon™ Rumble World
BR.description: O jogo Pokémon™ Rumble World é uma aventura cheia de ação que pode ser baixada gratuitamente. Batalhe e junte mais de 700 Toy Pokémon, incluindo alguns que podem megaevoluir! Você poderá viajar no seu balão e batalhar em 18 diferentes áreas com mais de 80 fases. Quanto mais Toy Pokémon você conseguir juntar, mais maneiras você terá de derrotar o Toy Pokémon que está enfrentando. Cada Toy Pokémon é de um tipo e cada tipo tem pontos fortes e pontos fracos, use-os para conseguir derrotar os seus inimigos rapidamente. Toy Pokémon raros também podem ser encontrados e coletados! Até Primal Groudon e Primal Kyogre aparecem como Toy Pokémon. Vista o seu personagem Mii™ com roupas interessantes e compartilhe seus figurinos com os seus amigos! Use Poké Diamonds para obter itens que lhe ajudam a progredir no jogo no seu próprio ritmo. Os Poké Diamonds podem ser comprados em uma loja no próprio jogo, usando o saldo da sua conta do Nintendo eShop. Você pode também ganhar alguns Poké Diamonds no jogo. Não é necessário comprar Poké Diamonds para jogar este jogo e se divertir com ele.

movies.name: Trailer de lançamento Pokémon™ Rumble World

BG.name: Pokémon Rumble World
BG.description: Wind up for an exciting adventure with Toy Pokémon in Pokémon Rumble World, available from Nintendo eShop for Nintendo 3DS family systems. In this action-packed title, battle through a variety of environments to collect more than 700 Toy Pokémon, and explore the kingdom of toys as your Mii! The ruler of the kingdom of toys has sent you on an adventure to track down as many Toy Pokémon as you can. Catch hot-air balloons to different areas to find all kinds of Toy Pokémon, including Pokémon from Pokémon Red and Pokémon Blue right through to Pokémon Omega Ruby and Pokémon Alpha Sapphire – some can even Mega Evolve! Where you go depends on the type of hot-air balloon you use, and you never know exactly where you’ll land in an area!

BE.name: Pokémon Rumble World
BE.description: Préparez-vous pour une aventure captivante avec les Jouets Pokémon dans Pokémon Rumble World, disponible sur le Nintendo eShop des consoles de la famille Nintendo 3DS. Dans ce titre plein d'action, vous allez combattre à travers des environnements aussi différents que variés pour récolter plus de 700 Jouets Pokémon et explorer Royaume des Jouets dans la peau de votre personnage Mii ! Le dirigeant du Royaume des Jouets vous charge d'une mission qui consiste à traquer autant de Jouet Pokémon que possible dans votre périple. Attrapez des montgolfières à différents endroits afin de trouver tous les types de Jouets Pokémon, y compris les Pokémon de Pokémon Version Rouge et Pokémon Version Bleue en passant par Pokémon Rubis Oméga et Pokémon Saphir Alpha – certains pouvant même méga-évoluer ! Votre destination dépend du type de montgolfière que vous utilisez, et vous ne savez jamais à l'avance où elles vous porteront !

CA.name: Pokémon™ Rumble World
CA.description: Download the latest version of Pokémon Rumble World for your Nintendo 3DS system today! Once you do, you’ll be able to visit a new area, get bonus items, and more! First, take a ride on the newly added Lucky Balloon. It will take you to a mysterious area called Changing Land, where you’re more likely to meet Pokémon you haven’t yet caught. The Lucky Balloon will be added to the hot-air balloons available in the shop. It’s free, but you’ll need to have reached Adventure Rank 40 to ride on it. Receive 100 Poké Diamonds when you update your game! Enter the following password into your game to receive 100 Poké Diamonds. You have to reach Adventure Rank 4 before you can enter the password. Password: 48213190 The Pokémon™ Rumble World game is an action-packed adventure that’s free to download. Battle and collect over 700 Toy Pokémon, including some that Mega Evolve! You’ll travel on your hot-air balloon and battle in 18 different areas with more than 80 stages. The more Toy Pokémon you collect, the more ways you have to defeat Toy Pokémon you’re facing. Each Toy Pokémon has a type, and each type has strengths and weaknesses—use them to your advantage to defeat your foes quickly. There are also rare Toy Pokémon to find and collect! Even Primal Groudon and Primal Kyogre appear as Toy Pokémon. Dress up your Mii™ character in cool outfits, and then share it with your friends! By using Poké Diamonds, players can obtain items that help them progress through the game at their own pace. Poké Diamonds can be purchased from an in-game shop with funds from your Nintendo eShop account. You also earn some Poké Diamonds in-game. Purchasing Poké Diamonds isn’t required to play or enjoy this title.

ES.name: Pokémon Rumble World
ES.description: Embárcate en una aventura en compañía de los Juguetes Pokémon en Pokémon Rumble World, disponible en Nintendo eShop para la familia de consolas Nintendo 3DS. En este juego de acción entrarás en combate en diferentes entornos con el objetivo de coleccionar más de 700 Juguetes Pokémon, y explorarás el Reino de los Juguetes encarnando a tu Mii. Le soberano del Reino de los Juguetes te encomienda la misión de capturar tantos Juguetes Pokémon como puedas. Monta en globo para llegar a diferentes zonas y atrapar todo tipo de Juguetes Pokémon, incluidos Pokémon de Pokémon Rojo y Pokémon Azul, hasta los Pokémon de Pokémon Rubí Omega y Pokémon Zafiro Alfa. ¡Algunos de ellos pueden incluso megaevolucionar! Tu lugar de destino dependerá del tipo de globo que uses, y nunca sabrás exactamente dónde vas a aterrizar.

IT.name: Pokémon Rumble World
IT.description: Dai la carica ai Pokémon giocattolo e affronta un'eccitante avventura in Pokémon Rumble World, disponibile sul Nintendo eShop per le console della famiglia Nintendo 3DS! In questo titolo pieno d'azione dovrai farti largo in molteplici ambientazioni per collezionare più di 700 Pokémon giocattolo ed esplorare il Paese dei Giocattoli col tuo Mii! Il re del Paese dei Giocattoli ti ha mandato all'avventura per recuperare tutti i Pokémon giocattolo che riesci a trovare. Cattura le mongolfiere in zone diverse per trovare tutti i tipi di Pokémon giocattolo, inclusi Pokémon di Pokémon versione Rossa e Pokémon versione Blu, Pokémon Rubino Omega Ruby e Pokémon Zaffiro Alpha: alcuni possono addirittura megaevolversi! La tua destinazione dipenderà dal tipo di mongolfiera che usi: la zona di atterraggio sarà sempre un'incognita!

JP.name: みんなのポケモンスクランブル
JP.description: 『ポケモンスクランブル』シリーズは、おもちゃのポケモンを直感的に操作するアクションゲームです。最新作の『みんなのポケモンスクランブル』は、無料で気軽にはじめることができるゲームで、メガシンカポケモンやゲンシグラードン･ゲンシカイオーガはもちろん、『ポケットモンスター オメガルビー･アルファサファイア』までに登場した719種類すべてのポケモンを集めることができる、ボリューム満点の内容となっています。 舞台は、おもちゃの王国。プレイヤーは気球を使って、いろいろなエリアへと冒険に行くことができます。気球の種類によって行けるエリアが決まっていて、ポケダイヤと呼ばれるアイテムを使って新たな気球を手に入れることで冒険できるエリアが広がり、エリアごとに違ったポケモンを集めることができます。ポケダイヤは、気球を手に入れる以外にも、ゲームを進める手助けをしてくれるアイテムで、ステージクリアやすれちがい通信などで無料で手に入れることができるほか、冒険の拠点、城下町にあるショップから、ニンテンドーeショップを通じて購入することもできます。

movies.name: みんなのポケモンスクランブル パッケージ版 紹介映像

MX.name: Pokémon™ Rumble World
MX.description: Pokémon™ Rumble World es un juego de aventura lleno de acción que se puede descargar gratuitamente. Combate y reúne más de 700 Juguetes Pokémon, incluyendo algunos que megaevolucionan. Viaja en tu globo y combate en 18 áreas diferentes con más de 80 fases. Entre más Juguetes Pokémon consigas, más oportunidades tendrás de vencer al Juguete Pokémon con el que te enfrentes. Cada Juguete Pokémon es de un tipo y cada tipo cuenta con diferentes debilidades y fortalezas que puedes aprovechar para vencer a tus enemigos de manera más rápida. También hay Juguetes Pokémon raros que podrás encontrar y coleccionar. ¡Incluso Groudon Primigenio y Kyogre Primigenio aparecen como Juguetes Pokémon! ¡Viste a tus personajes Mii™ con atuendos divertidos y luego compártelos con tus amigos! Al usar los Pokédiamantes, los jugadores podrán obtener objetos que les ayudarán a avanzar a lo largo del juego a su propio ritmo. Los Pokédiamantes pueden ser comprados desde el juego con fondos de tu cuenta de Nintendo eShop. Además puedes ganar algunos Pokédiamantes en el juego. No es necesario comprar Pokédiamantes para jugar o disfrutar de este título.

movies.name: Avance para lanzamiento Pokémon™ Rumble World

NO.name: Pokémon Rumble World
NO.description: Wind up for an exciting adventure with Toy Pokémon in Pokémon Rumble World, available from Nintendo eShop for Nintendo 3DS family systems. In this action-packed title, battle through a variety of environments to collect more than 700 Toy Pokémon, and explore the kingdom of toys as your Mii! NL.name: Pokémon Rumble World
NL.description: Zet je schrap voor een spannend avontuur met Toy Pokémon, in Pokémon Rumble World. De game is compatibel met de verschillende Nintendo 3DS-systemen en verkrijgbaar in de Nintendo eShop. In deze actierijke titel vecht je je een weg door allerlei gebieden, en verken je het Kingdom of Toys in de gedaante van je Mii-personage, om meer dan 700 Toy Pokémon te verzamelen! De heerser van het Kingdom of Toys stuurt je eropuit om zo veel mogelijk Toy Pokémon te vinden. Bezoek de verschillende gebieden met heteluchtballonnen om te zoeken naar Toy Pokémon in alle soorten en maten, waaronder Pokémon uit Pokémon Red en Pokémon Blue, tot en met Pokémon uit Pokémon Omega Ruby en Pokémon Alpha Sapphire. Sommige Pokémon kunnen zelfs evolueren met Mega Evolve! Je reisbestemming hangt af van de heteluchtballon die je neemt, hoewel je nooit precies weet waar je terechtkomt!

NZ.name: Pokémon Rumble World
NZ.description: Wind up for an exciting adventure with Toy Pokémon in Pokémon Rumble World, available from Nintendo eShop for Nintendo 3DS family systems. In this action-packed title, battle through a variety of environments to collect more than 700 Toy Pokémon, and explore the kingdom of toys as your Mii! PT.name: Pokémon Rumble World
PT.description: Pokémon Rumble World, disponível na Nintendo eShop da família de consolas Nintendo 3DS, é um título recheado de ação que te convida a combater numa variedade de ambientes para reunires mais de 700 Toy Pokémon e a explorar um reino de brinquedos na pele do teu Mii. O governador do reino dos brinquedos encomendou-te a missão de localizar o máximo de Toy Pokémon possível. Apanha balões de ar quente até diferentes áreas para encontrares todos os tipos de Toy Pokémon, incluindo Pokémon de Pokémon Red e Pokémon Blue ou de Pokémon Omega Ruby e Pokémon Alpha Sapphire – alguns até capazes de megaevoluir. Aonde vais parar depende do tipo de balão de ar quente que usas, sendo que nunca saberás exatamente em que ponto do território irás aterrar.

RU.name: Pokémon Rumble World
RU.description: Приготовьтесь к увлекательным приключениям с игрушечными покемонами в игре Pokémon Rumble World, которую можно загрузить в Nintendo eShop для систем линейки Nintendo 3DS. В этой динамичной и напряженной игре вы будете преодолевать различные препятствия, чтобы собрать более 700 игрушечных покемонов и исследовать королевство игрушек в образе своего Mii! Правитель королевства игрушек поручает вам найти как можно больше игрушечных покемонов. Путешествуйте на воздушных шарах в разные области, чтобы отыскать разные виды игрушечных покемонов, включая покемонов от Pokémon Red и Pokémon Blue до Pokémon Omega Ruby и Pokémon Alpha Sapphire. Некоторые из них даже могут мегаэволюционировать! От типа воздушного шара будет зависеть, куда именно вы отправитесь. И вы не будете знать заранее, где именно приземлитесь!

SE.name: Pokémon Rumble World
SE.description: Wind up for an exciting adventure with Toy Pokémon in Pokémon Rumble World, available from Nintendo eShop for Nintendo 3DS family systems. In this action-packed title, battle through a variety of environments to collect more than 700 Toy Pokémon, and explore the kingdom of toys as your Mii! The ruler of the kingdom of toys has sent you on an adventure to track down as many Toy Pokémon as you can. Catch hot-air balloons to different areas to find all kinds of Toy Pokémon, including Pokémon from Pokémon Red and Pokémon Blue right through to Pokémon Omega Ruby and Pokémon Alpha Sapphire – some can even Mega Evolve! Where you go depends on the type of hot-air balloon you use, and you never know exactly where you’ll land in an area!

US.name: Pokémon™ Rumble World
US.description: Download the latest version of Pokémon Rumble World for your Nintendo 3DS system today! Once you do, you’ll be able to visit a new area, get bonus items, and more! First, take a ride on the newly added Lucky Balloon. It will take you to a mysterious area called Changing Land, where you’re more likely to meet Pokémon you haven’t yet caught. The Lucky Balloon will be added to the hot-air balloons available in the shop. It’s free, but you’ll need to have reached Adventure Rank 40 to ride on it. Receive 100 Poké Diamonds when you update your game! Enter the following password into your game to receive 100 Poké Diamonds. You have to reach Adventure Rank 4 before you can enter the password. Password: 48213190 The Pokémon™ Rumble World game is an action-packed adventure that’s free to download. Battle and collect over 700 Toy Pokémon, including some that Mega Evolve! You’ll travel on your hot-air balloon and battle in 18 different areas with more than 80 stages. The more Toy Pokémon you collect, the more ways you have to defeat Toy Pokémon you’re facing. Each Toy Pokémon has a type, and each type has strengths and weaknesses—use them to your advantage to defeat your foes quickly. There are also rare Toy Pokémon to find and collect! Even Primal Groudon and Primal Kyogre appear as Toy Pokémon. Dress up your Mii™ character in cool outfits, and then share it with your friends! By using Poké Diamonds, players can obtain items that help them progress through the game at their own pace. Poké Diamonds can be purchased from an in-game shop with funds from your Nintendo eShop account. You also earn some Poké Diamonds in-game. Purchasing Poké Diamonds isn’t required to play or enjoy this title.
